example.name: autogen1
example.text: According to the suit , Apple officials created public excitement by touting Lisa as an office computer that would revolutionize the workplace and be extremely successful in its first year .
example.arg: by touting Lisa as an office computer that would revolutionize the workplace and be extremely successful in its first year

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the headlines created by such scoops will generate excitement for its `` branded '' programs , in the way `` 60 Minutes '' did so well for CBS
example.arg: the headlines created by such scoops
